title: PictureinPicture
extract: Picture-in-picture (PiP) is a feature of some television receivers and similar devices. ... Picture-in-picture is often used to watch one program while waiting for another to start, or advertisements to finish.
extract_html: Picture-in-picture (PiP) is a feature of some television receivers and similar devices. ... Picture-in-picture is often used to watch one program while waiting for another to start, or advertisements to finish.
